text: hē muminasakala! Tōmālōkara dāẏitba tōmālōkara ōparatē'i. Tōmālōkē yadi saṯpathata paraicālita hōraā tēntē yiẏē pathabhraṣṭa haichē si tōmālōkara kōnō kṣati karaiba nōraāraiba. Āllāhara pinē'i tōmālōka sakalōraē pratyārartana, tāra pichata tōmālōkē yi karaichilā sē'i sambandhē tē'ōm̐ tōmālōkaka arahita karaiba
